title: Molly Holly
summary: Nora Kristina Benshoof[6] (n√©e Greenwald; born on September 7, 1977[1][2]) is an American semi-retired professional wrestler signed to WWE as a producer, she is best known for her appearances with the said company from 2000 to 2005 under the ring name Molly Holly. She is also known for her appearances with World Championship Wrestling (WCW) as Miss Madness and Mona in 1999 to 2000.
